body: @ss4chris Cheating tag was for the married woman he banged in the sauna. He even makes note of her wedding ring before anything happens.
This was one of my first doujins/hentai manga ever, found it on good ol kissmanga (RIP)

re-reading again. why is there a cheating tag if he dnt have a girlfriend. first girl was just a fling it seems. also assuming it was shizuku's first time so  maybe a defloration tag?

also an epilogue be nice. marriage and kids. but cant complain.
shit was awesome. okay i read all of the author's works that werent ntr.
